features: Alcohol-free formula with 7 main skincare actives for effective results.
Soothes and hydrates sensitive and dry skin for a healthy look and feel. Nourishing herbs with antioxidant properties protect and enhance the suppleness of your skin.
[Hyaluronic acid, Mandarin] Helps balance skin’s hydration level.
[Ceramide, Green Tea] Protects the skin and enhances the suppleness and appearance of dry and damaged skin.
Fragrance-free and non-comedogenic to avoid skin irritation and clogged pores.
Full-size bottle with 11.1 fl oz for long-lasting use.
Fast-absorbing formula allows for easy application and quick results.
Suitable for use on cleansed facial skin in sweeping motions.
For external use only. Keep out of children's reach and avoid contact with eyes. Store in a dry, cool place at room temperature, away from direct sunlight and humidity.
Experience the Annu:Ve difference today and give your skin the hydration and nourishment it deserves. Order now and discover why so many customers choose our Facial Toner for their skincare routine!
body.description: Experience the nourishing benefits of Annu:Ve Skin Balancing, Soothing, Alcohol-Free, Fast Absorbing Facial Toner. Enriched with seven main skincare actives and nourishing herbs with antioxidant properties, this toner protects, soothes, hydrates, and enhances the suppleness of your skin.Perfect for those with sensitive and dry skin, our fragrance-free and non-comedogenic formula is fast-absorbing and leaves your skin looking and feeling healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not sealed. Licking, not a full bottle
reviews.reviewText: The product was opened amd licking all over the box. This product was not new

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Double cleansing and Hydrates
reviews.reviewText: I used a cotton pad and soaked it with the toner. The toner is a little thicker than water texture wise. It was scent free and cool on contact. The cotton pad looked yellowish after I wiped my face. Then I pour a little more of the toner and padded on my face until it got absorbed completely. My skin stings a little bit for some reason. I do not have sensitive skin though. Other than that, I don’t have any further irritations or anything negative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and soothing
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this because it is alcohol free and I tend to avoid alcohol in my face products. I love this toner, it is gentle, cleanses well and helps prep my face for skin care. I usually use this with a cotton ball, but I do like to put some in a spray bottle and mist on my face. It works well both ways and is non drying and doesn't make my face greasy. Just feels clean and fresh. The bottle is pretty big and a good deal from what I used to buy for less product. I am a fan of the ingredients and quality, this is great for sensitive and blemish prone skin. I do not notice any scent and there is no fragrance in the formula.
